Real Capital Analytics: Web Application

I was contracted to implement the web designs provided by the ux designers. I used semantic HTML5 and CSS3 to build the designs from psd to an actual build. The web application was built to be responsive and scalable by implementing CSS3 media queries and modular javaScript through angularJS framework. The client needed deep-linking capabilities, so I used angularJS UI Router, which offered the ability to create nested views and deep linking through state of the hash. Grunt was used to compile the CSS rules from SASS mixins and variables. Git version control.
